title: Self-Portrait
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

LLC, in brown i LRC, in brown ink: [Henri Monnier]; see Inscriptio
description: standing man against a grey-green ground; heavy-set, balding man with black hair and long sideburns; PR gloved hand under chin, PL hand in pants pocket; man wears pale grey vest, dark coat, grey pants and glasses
creditline: Gift of Eric G. Carlson in honor of Allyson Hartle
